title: Toast targets 24% recurring gross profit growth in 2025 while expanding new markets

Management View

  • Aman Narang, CEO and Co-Founder, highlighted Toast's addition of 28,000 net locations in 2024, reaching 134,000 total locations. He emphasized the company’s first full year of GAAP profitability and a 34% growth in recurring gross
